name: GetZoomDailyReport
description:
Retrieve daily Zoom usage statistics for account-wide overview.

This tool retrieves a daily report detailing the account-wide usage of Zoom services, including new users, meetings, participants, and meeting minutes for each day in a specified month. Requires a Pro or higher plan and the `report:read:admin` scope.

parameters.name: report_year
parameters.description: The year for which the Zoom usage report is requested. Must be a valid integer year.

parameters.name: report_month
parameters.description: The month (1-12) for the report. Specify as an integer.

parameters.name: zoom_group_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Zoom group for which you want to retrieve the usage report. Use the 'List groups' API to find the ID. The report will only include users in this group.

value_schema.description:
The group ID. To get a group ID, use the [**List groups**](/docs/api/users/#tag/groups/GET/groups) API. 

 **Note:** The API response will only contain users who are members of the queried group ID.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description:
The group ID. To get a group ID, use the [**List groups**](/docs/api/users/#tag/groups/GET/groups) API. 

 **Note:** The API response will only contain users who are members of the queried group ID.

value_schema.description:
The group ID. To get a group ID, use the [**List groups**](/docs/api/users/#tag/groups/GET/groups) API. 

 **Note:** The API response will only contain users who are members of the queried group ID.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
